question: For the last few years, my mother has stopped eating meat. She needs to have protein for her diabetes, but has no appetite. She's 82. Docs don't seem to know why she is not eating meat. She has lost drastic amounts of weight. In general, her appetite is low. She has diabetes, thyroid issues, heart condition and arthritis and takes meds for all.
title: Mother doesn't eat
